description: Pork ribs glazed in a smoky BBQ sauce? Yum. This mouthwatering recipe is taken next level with a sweet corn salad that's the perfect accompaniment.
keywords: BBQ-Glazed Ribs With Charred Corn & Tomato Salad
name: BBQ-Glazed Ribs With Charred Corn & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3 kg Woolworths COOK slow cooked pork ribs in smokey BBQ sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Add corn, tomatoes, onion, half of the parsley and zest to remaining lime mixture and toss to combine. Garnish ribs and salad with remaining parsley, then serve.
